{"id":766529010,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1659778413,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"86 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/766529010/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Median of Two Sorted Arrays","memory":"90.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double findMedianSortedArrays(vector<int>& nums1, vector<int>& nums2) {\n        vector<int> combined;\n        for (auto i : nums1)\n            combined.push_back(i);\n        for (auto i : nums2)\n            combined.push_back(i);\n        sort(combined.begin(), combined.end());\n        if(combined.size() & 1)\n            return combined[combined.size() / 2];\n        double result = (double) combined[combined.size() / 2] + (double) combined[combined.size() / 2 - 1];\n        result /= 2;\n        return result;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"median-of-two-sorted-arrays"}
